name: Wasp Nest Simulator 3D
description:
Establish your own virtual wasp colony. This 3D survival and animal game will set you into a realistic simulation of the insect world. Expire adventures from the perspective of a dangerous wasp. Discover a huge detailed natural insect habitat popolated by diffrent kinds of insects.

Search for food resources in order to feed the wasp queen and members of your wasp colony. But beware of huge spiders and praying mantises that are ill-disposed to you. After the required amount of food, the queen will lay eggs which evolves to lavae. Supply them with protein in form of other insects so that they can popate in order to transform to a new wasp.

Enforce attacks to overwhelm larger insects with the power of the swarm and collect protein pieces of dead insects. To control the worker wasps you can command them diretcly or create perhomon trails to get support from solider wasps.

Enlarge the wasp nest - Grub tunnels and huge chambers. Once your colony is big enough you can recruit worker for digging as well.


3D Wasp Nest Simulator
* very realistic wasp behaviour (swarm inteligence, pheromone communication)
-> Wasp AI - watch their swarm behaviour, see how they use pheromone trails
* explore a detailed, huge 3d natural insect habitat terrain
-> forest environment, different plants, realistic textures, water
* Insect Simulator - other insects as protein spider, praying mantis worms, fly etc.
-> (scorpion simulator, praying mantis simulator)
* attack and fight against enemy insects
->overwhelm insects with the power of the swarm
* collect food in the form of fruit or sugar to feed the queen and lavas
* first person, easy touch control
*explore underground caves and build a huge underground nest
->enlarge the wasp nest, grub new chambers
publishers: H. K. Solution Gesellschaft mit beschraenkter Haftung
